lead_paragraph: As the infant’s wailing continued, Mr. Trump’s remarks on the situation shifted from “I love babies” to “I was only kidding, you can get that baby out of here.”

headline.print_headline: Trump Rally Evictions: Young, Old, Loud, Silent
headline.main: Donald Trump Jousts With a Crying Baby at His Rally

snippet: As the infant’s wailing continued, Mr. Trump’s remarks on the situation shifted from “I love babies” to “I was only kidding, you can get that baby out of here.”...
